D|Main 97 on 12 Feb 2016 F|[Graphics] Replay not show car and track. F|[Graphics] Recce not show car and track. A|New console command: PATH_DISABLE and PATH_ENABLE, to disable and re-enable the path calculation (the function that check where is the car, is necessary to detect the distance driven and the pacenotes playing). A|New console command: STATS that shows the current fps stats and save them into output_log.txt file.
